stadium.name: The Prismatic Pavilion
stadium.description: A massive, permanent, open-air fairground pavilion built on stilts over the Starlight Lagoon. The field is a chaotic mix of colorful stage-planks, constantly surrounded by the Prismatic Troupe's performers.

stats.pregame_ritual: Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Jogging three laps around the perimeter of the field.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Staring at their reflection in a bucket of water until they feel 'ready'.
Telling a terrible joke to the Trollball to 'loosen it up'.
Staring intently at their gauntlets, as if for the first time.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Trying to start a 'slow clap' with the audience before the game has begun.

stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: WEEK 5 PRE-GAME SPECTACULAR! üéôÔ∏è

**GOOD EVENING, OSTERRA!** Nok the Corrupter here, broadcasting LIVE on the Aether-waves! Can you feel that electricity in the air? Or maybe that's just the smell of ozone and unwashed goblin mail! We are in Week 5, folks, and tonight we are perched precariously atop the **Prismatic Pavilion** in the Starlight Lagoon! That's right, the field is built on **stilts**! One wrong step and these warriors are taking a bath with the fishes! The footing is unstable, the crowd is distracted by clowns, and I am ABSOLUTELY THRILLED!

Let's talk about our visitors, the **Kerlauger Runeguard**! ü¶Ö Coming all the way from the Old Fort, these heavy hitters represent the **White Ravens**. You know, Dame Terra's lot? I heard **Colm**, the Most Cursed Man in Osterra, gave them a pep talk. Let's hope his curse is contagious, because I want to see some disasters! I was watching warm-ups, and I saw **Vivia Namara** spit into her own hand and slap herself in the face! HA! Now THAT is how you wake up! **Harilda Sigsmond** has been leading a synchronized chant that is honestly terrifying. They look ready to turn this circus into a graveyard!

And for the home team, the **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres**! üé™ Sponsored by the **Prismatic Troupes** and that ringleader **Kython**‚Äîwho I must admit, knows how to throw a party! These folks are fighting on their home turf, amidst the colorful planks and carnival barkers. I saw **Demp Chet** staring at his reflection in a bucket of water for a solid twenty minutes before the match. Was he contemplating the abyss? Or just checking his hair? Who cares! **Quintessa Austine** tried to start a slow clap with the audience before the game even started‚Äîthe audacity! Grab your popcorn and your bandages, folks, because the **STARS ARE OUT AND THE KNIVES ARE SHARP!** IT'S TROLLBALL TIME!
postGame:
# üéôÔ∏è POST-GAME CARNAGE REPORT: BIZARRES BASKET BRAWL! üéôÔ∏è

**MERCY ME, WHAT A BLOODBATH!** The final whistle has blown, the splinters are being pulled out of the players, and we have a decisive victory! The **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** have shut out the competition with a final score of **3 to 0** over the **Kerlauger Runeguard**! The Runeguard brought the weapons, but the Bizarres brought the points! Let's break down this chaotic night at the Pavilion!

First off, the game started with a case of the "Butter-Fingers"! **Milo Nelie** and **Kristin Kronfeld** looked like they were juggling hot coals instead of a Troll head! Drop after drop! It was pathetic! But the violence picked up the slack immediately! **Lorilee Aldred** of the Runeguard decided they didn't like **Aggri Cookie's** face and introduced it to the floorboards! CRUNCH! That is what we call an opener, folks!

Then, the momentum shifted! **Benjie Foulk** threw a pass that was so wild it might as well have been aimed at the moon! **Melesa Zelten** snatched it out of the air‚ÄîINTERCEPTION! Melesa ran like a demon possessed, dodging tackles left and right! The crowd went wild, or maybe that was just the Prismatic Troupe juggling fire nearby!

And then, the moment of glory! **Demp Chet**, fresh from his bucket-staring session, scooped up the ball. He ran! He dodged! He found the End Zone and **DUNKED THAT LEATHER HEAD RIGHT INTO THE BASKET!** BOOM! **1-0 Bizarres!** The planks rattled, the water splashed, and the home team took the lead!

The rest of the first half was a clinic in pain management! **Lashondra Niehaus** absolutely folded **Pompei Hephzipa** like a cheap lawn chair! **Vivia Namara**‚Äîthe one who slaps herself‚Äîslapped **Kristin Kronfeld** even harder, sending them to the healers! And **Shepperd Trefler**? Oh, just a casual double-takedown performance! The healers **Eal Caundra** and **Essa Pattie** were working overtime, probably wishing they were back at the **Greenwatch** with Falric counting coins instead of stitching limbs!

**HALFTIME** came and went, and I assume the Runeguard spent it praying to whatever dusty runes they worship. But it didn't help! The second half opened with **Pompei Hephzipa** returning from the dead to exact revenge on **Vivia Namara**! BAM! That is the circle of life in Trollball! You get hit, you get healed, you hit back!

Let's talk about **Gagliano Tallbott**. This player woke up and chose VIOLENCE! First, they took out **Lashondra Niehaus**. Then, not satisfied, they dismantled **Shepperd Trefler**! Two knockouts back-to-back! That is efficiency! That is passion! That is why I love this sport!

While bodies were hitting the deck, **Milo Nelie** decided to end the conversation. From **Home Field**‚Äîmiles away!‚ÄîMilo launches the Trollball! It arcs through the fog! It misses the seagulls! IT GOES THROUGH THE UPRIGHTS! **SHOOT AND SCORE!** Two points! The lead extends to **3-0**!

The Runeguard looked desperate in the final minutes. **Harilda Sigsmond** tried to rally the troops, but they just couldn't hold onto the ball! And just to add insult to injury‚Äîliterally‚Äî**Aggri Cookie**, who started the game getting flattened, ended the game by flattening **Harilda Sigsmond**! A poetic end to a violent evening!

So there you have it! The **White Ravens**' curse strikes again for the Kerlauger Runeguard! **Dame Terra** might be able to kidnap prophets, but she can't kidnap a win tonight! The **Starlight Bazaar Bizarres** defend their watery fortress! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! **DRINK UP, PASS OUT, AND WE'LL SEE YOU NEXT TUESDAY!**
